content: We're less than 24 hours into the survey and we already have 3165 completed surveys - I believe we had over 9000 last year so still some ways to go, but very pleased so far. I imagine it will take a bit for the survey to reach less enthusiastic Rustaceans though.
Have we promoted it on users.r-l.o, HN, r/rust etc? I saw an official tweet
I did not see a HN entry but I didn't look hard.
Doesn't look like it was posted there.
Is there a way to pin threads there? Perhaps we can ask the mods to temporarily do so?
You can pin threads, I'm not sure who the mods are though
I've posted to HN and to users.r-l.o, I also opened an issue to track places where there has been feedback.
A little over 24 hours after launch, and we're over 5,000 full responses
